name: The Bad DM
description:
Bad DM 

Your Dungeon Master has vowed to TPK your party. You are all that’s left. Can you survive the dungeon masters spells and beat him at his own game… 

How to Play:

  • Use WASD to move.
  • Dodge the Dungeon Masters spells.
  • Pick up the dice on the board.
  • Press ‘Space’ to deal the rolled damage to the Dungeon Master.
  • Or hold on to it and pick up another dice.
  • If you have two dice your damage is doubled.
  • But don’t get hit – damage will cause you to drop your dice.
